rows.label: qst200704_msg0001
rows.name: Oh my... What on earth is going on...

rows.label: qst200704_msg0002
rows.name:
Um... Do you know anything
about this sculpture?

rows.label: qst200704_msg0003
rows.name: Th-that sculpture...?!

rows.label: qst200704_msg0004
rows.name:
Thank goodness! You found it
for me! Thank you so much!

rows.label: qst200704_msg0005
rows.name: What's going on-ppo?

rows.label: qst200704_msg0006
rows.name:
I'm not sure what's going on
either... What happened?

rows.label: qst200704_msg0007
rows.name:
I-I'm sorry. I was so
happy I lost myself...

rows.label: qst200704_msg0008
rows.name:
A few days ago, I received a calling
card from Phantom Thief Maumau, saying
he would steal my sculpture.

rows.label: qst200704_msg0009
rows.name:
But before Maumau appeared,
the sculpture vanished
right before my eyes...

rows.label: qst200704_msg0010
rows.name:
I had no idea what happened
and was at a complete loss.

rows.label: qst200704_msg0011
rows.name:
I've been carving this sculpture
for nearly 20 years, and it's
still not finished.

rows.label: qst200704_msg0012
rows.name:
If I can't finish this, I won't
be able to rest in peace!

rows.label: qst200704_msg0040
rows.name:
But you hid it in a safe
place for me, didn't you?

rows.label: qst200704_msg0039
rows.name:
Thanks to you, it wasn't
stolen by Phantom Thief
Maumau. I'm so glad...

rows.label: qst200704_msg0041
rows.name:
I can't thank you enough.
Truly, thank you!

rows.label: qst200704_msg0013
rows.name: I-I see... That's good... hahaha.

rows.label: qst200704_msg0042
rows.name:
By the way, do you know who
this Phantom Thief Maumau is?

rows.label: qst200704_msg0043
rows.name:
He's the bad guy who stole
Idaten's precious food-ppo!

rows.label: qst200704_msg0044
rows.name: Phantom Thief Maumau is famous.

rows.label: qst200704_msg0045
rows.name:
He's a Nopon phantom thief and
is popular with children.

rows.label: qst200704_msg0046
rows.name:
He's a noble thief, so to speak.
He steals treasures from villains
and gives them to poor Nopon.

rows.label: qst200704_msg0047
rows.name:
Well, his flaw is that he
sometimes steals from
people who aren't bad...

rows.label: qst200704_msg0048
rows.name: That's not true-mau!

rows.label: qst200704_msg0049
rows.name:
Sculptor, last week you ate your
daughter Odifa's food without
permission-mau. This is retribution-mau!

rows.label: qst200704_msg0050
rows.name: I-It was just one bite...

rows.label: qst200704_msg0051
rows.name:
That doesn't change the fact
that it was wrong-mau!

rows.label: qst200704_msg0052
rows.name:
But there was an unexpected interruption-mau.
To think someone would steal the sculpture
before Maumau could-mau...

rows.label: qst200704_msg0014
rows.name:
It was you who interfered with
Maumau, wasn't it-mau! Idaten!

rows.label: qst200704_msg0015
rows.name:
How much more must you
insult Phantom Thief Maumau
to be satisfied-mau!

rows.label: qst200704_msg0016
rows.name:
You're the one who stole
Idaten's precious food-ppo?!

rows.label: qst200704_msg0017
rows.name:
Maffuffu... Slowpoke. Have
you finally realized-mau?

rows.label: qst200704_msg0018
rows.name: That's right-mau...

rows.label: qst200704_msg0019
rows.name:
The phantom thief who stole
every last bit of food from your
food box is this Maumau-mau!

rows.label: qst200704_msg0020
rows.name: Why would you do such a thing-ppo!

rows.label: qst200704_msg0021
rows.name:
Why-mau? Idaten should
know the reason best-mau.

rows.label: qst200704_msg0053
rows.name: You should ask your own heart-mau...

rows.label: qst200704_msg0054
rows.name: Hmmm... Why was it stolen-ppo?

rows.label: qst200704_msg0056
rows.name: It's not answering at all-ppo!

rows.label: qst200704_msg0057
rows.name: You gluttonous white balloon-mau!

rows.label: qst200704_msg0022
rows.name:
You won the speed-eating contest at Harapekko
Canteen, became a speed-eating hero, and
stole the pure hearts of the Nopon-mau!

rows.label: qst200704_msg0023
rows.name:
The hearts of those cute
Nopon... The hearts of
those innocent Nopon...

rows.label: qst200704_msg0024
rows.name:
Maumau could not steal
them-mau. Those pure hearts...

rows.label: qst200704_msg0025
rows.name:
Idaten stole those hearts and played
with them-mau! That sin is worthy
of ten thousand deaths-mau!!

rows.label: qst200704_msg0026
rows.name: Popopopopo!

rows.label: qst200704_msg0027
rows.name:
Mauuu, I see, I see-mau... So you
provoke Maumau like that-mau.

rows.label: qst200704_msg0028
rows.name:
I see, it's a sign of your
confidence that your thieving
skills are better than Maumau's-mau.

rows.label: qst200704_msg0029
rows.name:
Very well, then it's a duel-mau!
We'll settle who is the master
phantom thief-mau!

rows.label: qst200704_msg0030
rows.name: Uh, that's rather sudden...

rows.label: qst200704_msg0031
rows.name: The match is simple and clear-mau!

rows.label: qst200704_msg0032
rows.name:
Get a lightly glowing feather
from the Ansel breeding ground
in the Liberalitas Archipelago...

rows.label: qst200704_msg0033
rows.name:
The one who returns to
Harapekko Canteen before
the other is the winner-mau!

rows.label: qst200704_msg0034
rows.name:
If you can defeat Maumau, I'll return
everything in your food box-mau!

rows.label: qst200704_msg0035
rows.name:
I accept that challenge-ppo! I'll
get back my precious food-ppo!!

rows.label: qst200704_msg0036
rows.name: H-hey! Wait, Idaten! Don't go alone!

rows.label: qst200704_msg0037
rows.name:
W-wait a minute-mau?! I haven't
given the starting signal yet-mau!

rows.label: qst200704_msg0038
rows.name:
That's a false start-mau! That's
cheating-mau! Let's do it over-mau!
